grid.sql: select t.*, $2::integer as userId from palk.cur_palk_taabel t where (t.rekvid = $1 or rekvid is null)

select.sql: SELECT $2 :: INTEGER AS userid, 'PALK_TAABEL' AS doc_type_id, p.id, p.lepingid, p.kuu, p.aasta, p.kokku, p.too, p.paev, p.ohtu, p.oo, p.tahtpaev, p.puhapaev, p.uleajatoo, p.status, p.muud, t.parentid FROM palk.palk_taabel1 p inner join palk.tooleping t on t.id = p.lepingid WHERE p.id = $1
select.sqlAsNew: SELECT $1 :: INTEGER AS id, $2 :: INTEGER AS userid, 'PALK_TAABEL' AS doc_type_id, 0 as id, 0::integer as lepingid, month(current_date)::integer as kuu, year(current_date)::integer as aasta, 0::numeric(12,4) as kokku, 0::numeric(12,4) as too, 0::numeric(12,4) as paev, 0::numeric(12,4) as ohtu, 0::numeric(12,4) as oo, 0::numeric(12,4) as tahtpaev, 0::numeric(12,4) as puhapaev, 0::numeric(12,4) as uleajatoo, 1 as status, 0::integer as parentid, null::text as muud

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from palk.sp_delete_palk_taabel($1, $2)

executeCommand.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from palk.gen_taabel1($1, $2::json)
